name: Apex Men's Casual Shoe
description:
Apex Men's Casual Shoe blends simplicity with comfort. The leather upper adds a refined touch, while the TPR sole provides durability and grip. Designed without laces for easy wear, it’s a go-to choice for effortless everyday style.
Features:

Genuine leather upper for a polished look.
Laceless design for convenient slip-on wear.
TPR sole ensures flexibility and durability.
Ideal for everyday casual wear.

name: Sprint Men's Sports Shoe
description:
Sprint Men's Sports Shoe is designed for peak performance, featuring a breathable mesh upper that ensures ventilation and comfort during intense workouts. The moisture-wicking lining keeps your feet fresh, while the EVA outsole provides cushioning to reduce impact, making this shoe ideal for high-intensity activities.
